comment: Smart data models - CooledBeam schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.S4BLDG/master/CooledBeam/schema.json
description: A cooled beam (or chilled beam) is a device typically used to cool air by circulating a fluid such as chilled water through exposed finned tubes above a space. Typically mounted overhead near or within a ceiling, the cooled beam uses convection to cool the space below it by acting as a heat sink for the naturally rising warm air of the space. Once cooled, the air naturally drops back to the floor where the cycle begins again.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: coilLength
contents.comment: Property. Length of coil. Usually measured in millimeters (mm).

contents.name: coilWidth
contents.comment: Property. Width of coil. Usually measured in millimeters (mm

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: finishColor
contents.comment: Property. Finish color for cooled beam.

contents.name: hasManufacturer
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the manufacturer of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: hasModel
contents.comment: Property. A relationship identifying the model of an entity (e.g., device). The value is expected to be a string or a string with language tag.

contents.name: integratedLightingType
contents.comment: Property. Integrated lighting in cooled beam.

contents.name: isFreeHanging
contents.comment: Property. Is it free hanging type (not mounted in a false ceiling)?

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: nominalCoolingCapacity
contents.comment: Property. Nominal cooling capacity. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).

contents.name: nominalHeatingCapacity
contents.comment: Property. Nominal heating capacity. Usually measured in Watts (W, J/s).

contents.name: nominalReturnWaterTemperatureCooling
contents.comment: Property. Nominal return water temperature (refers to nominal cooling capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).

contents.name: nominalReturnWaterTemperatureHeating
contents.comment: Property. Nominal return water temperature (refers to nominal heating capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).

contents.name: nominalSorroundingHumidityCooling
contents.comment: Property. Nominal surrounding humidity (refers to nominal cooling capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).

contents.name: nominalSorroundingTemperatureCooling
contents.comment: Property. Nominal surrounding temperature (refers to nominal cooling capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).

contents.name: nominalSorroundingTemperatureHeating
contents.comment: Property. Nominal surrounding temperature (refers to nominal heating capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).

contents.name: nominalSupplyWaterTemperatureCooling
contents.comment: Property. Nominal supply water temperature (refers to nominal cooling capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).

contents.name: nominalSupplyWaterTemperatureHeating
contents.comment: Property. Nominal supply water temperature (refers to nominal heating capacity). Usually measured in degrees Kelvin (K).

contents.name: nominalWaterFlowCooling
contents.comment: Property. Nominal water flow (refers to nominal cooling capacity). Usually measured in m3/s.

contents.name: nominalWaterFlowHeating
contents.comment: Property. Nominal water flow (refers to nominal heating capacity). Usually measured in m3/s.

contents.name: pipeConnectionEnum
contents.comment: Property. The manner in which the pipe connection is made to the cooled beam.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: waterFlowControlSystemType
contents.comment: Property. Factory fitted waterflow control system.

contents.name: waterPressureMax
contents.comment: Property. Allowable water circuit working pressure range. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).

contents.name: waterPressureMin
contents.comment: Property. Allowable water circuit working pressure range. Usually measured in Pascals (Pa, N/m2).

contents.name: isSubSystemOf
contents.comment: Relationship. A reference to a system(s) that this Physical Object is part of.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
